description: Add a specifications/ directory convention that allows repos to define project-specific guidance for AI agents, with selective reading based on current story context

userStories.title: Update AGENTS.md with specifications awareness
userStories.description: As an AI agent, I need instructions on when and how to read project specifications so that I can access relevant project knowledge without loading unnecessary context
acceptanceCriteria: Add new step in AGENTS.md task list (after picking a story) to check for specifications/AGENTS.md
Instruction directs agent to read specifications/AGENTS.md if it exists
Instruction emphasizes reading ONLY specs relevant to the current story (not all specs)
Add rule to 'Important' section: 'Do NOT edit anything in the specifications/ directory'
Renumber existing steps appropriately
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Add specifications scaffolding to install.sh
userStories.description: As a user installing Ralph, I want a specifications/ directory created automatically with a template AGENTS.md so that I can start documenting project patterns immediately
acceptanceCriteria: install.sh creates $TARGET_DIR/specifications/ directory during installation
install.sh writes specifications/AGENTS.md with template structure
Template includes header explaining the specifications convention
Template shows format for listing specs with routing rules (when to read each)
Template has no example spec files listed (user adds their own)
Template includes note that Ralph never edits specification files
Typecheck/lint passes (shellcheck if available)

userStories.title: Add specifications check to doctor.sh
userStories.description: As a user running health checks, I want doctor.sh to validate my specifications setup so that I get informational feedback about whether specs are configured
acceptanceCriteria: Add new check in doctor.sh for specifications/ directory
Check always PASSES (informational only, not a failure condition)
If specifications/ doesn't exist, show: 'INFO: No specifications/ directory found (optional)'
If specifications/ exists without AGENTS.md, show: 'INFO: specifications/ exists but missing AGENTS.md index'
If specifications/ exists with AGENTS.md, show: 'PASS: Specifications configured'
Check runs after existing validation checks
Typecheck/lint passes

userStories.title: Document specifications convention
userStories.description: As a Ralph user, I want clear documentation on the specifications system so that I understand how to create and organize project-specific guidance for AI agents
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Specifications' section to ralph/README.md
Explain purpose: human-curated project docs that agents read selectively
Document specifications/AGENTS.md role as index/router
Show example structure with 2-3 hypothetical spec files
Note that Ralph reads specs selectively (not all at once)
Note that Ralph never modifies specification files
Keep documentation concise (quick reference level, not full guide)
Typecheck/lint passes
